data.name: Flight from Xibun and Soite
data.desc: Mayas rebel against Sp authority and desert Xibun and Soite hamlets in favour of forests, whereupon regidor and alférez Cristóbal Sánchez reduces them to their former towns, with help from Ma residents of Zacatan
data.agents_sp: Cristóbal Sánchez, Capt Bartolomé Palomino, Btb Andrés Canul
data.agents_nsp0: Btb Gaspar Chan, Btb Francisco Ek
data.prim_n: AGN Hist 410 f 223v / Egerton MS 1791 ff 53-54v / [missg] [Petición de Cristóbal Sánchez, 1631] / MEXICO,912 ff 885r-909r
data.note:
At mid-century the country south of Río Hondo was practically deserted /v Gerhard 72 /[missg] /
 Shortly before the Spanish withdrawal [fm Bacalar in 1650s], in 1639, there were still nineteen [Ma] village sites up to fifty leagues from Bacalar, although we are told that their inhabitants had recently fled to the Itzá country. /v Gerhard 73 /Egerton MS [missg]
